summary:
AC Milan is a famous Italian football team from Milan, Lombardy. Founded in 1899, they play in Serie A, the country's top league. Their home is the San Siro stadium, shared with rivals Inter Milan. With 75,817 seats, it's Italy's largest football stadium.

Milan has a rich history, winning 19 Serie A titles and 7 European Cups, making them Italy's most successful club internationally. They've also claimed the Ballon d'Or multiple times. The club's most successful period was under Silvio Berlusconi, lasting 31 years. During this time, Milan dominated, winning many trophies, including multiple Serie A and Champions League titles.
title: AC Milan
